'''Gilly Brownlock''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Gilly married [[Posco Baggins]], and they had several children: [[Ponto Baggins II|Ponto]], [[Porto Baggins|Porto]] and [[Peony Baggins|Peony]].

Gilly with her children and grandchildren, was present at [[Bilbo Baggins]]' [[Birthday Party]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

==Etymology==
Gilly is perhaps a reference to the [[wikipedia:gilliflower|gilliflower]].<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>
